```{r setup, include = FALSE}
`%>%` <- magrittr::`%>%`

percentage_columns <- function(
    data,
    accuracy = 0.1
) {
    data %>%
        dplyr::mutate(dplyr::across(
            tidyselect:::where(is.numeric),
            scales::percent,
            accuracy = accuracy
        )) %>%
        return()
}

analysis <-
    params %>%
    magrittr::extract2("analysis") %>%
    magrittr::extract2(1)
```
